# FRISS Java Client

This Repository is generated by swagger codegen from the open API Spec published under https://apigateway.frisscloud.com/swagger/index.html.

FRISS API
- API version: 1.0.0
  - Build date: 2022-03-03T11:30:23.717Z[GMT]

No description provided (generated by Swagger Codegen https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)


*Automatically generated by the [Swagger Codegen](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)*


## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:
1. Java 1.7+
2. Maven/Gradle

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>io.swagger</groupId>
  <artifactId>swagger-java-client</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
compile "io.swagger:swagger-java-client:1.0.0"
```

### Others

At first generate the JAR by executing:

```shell
mvn clean package
```

Then manually install the following JARs:

* `target/swagger-java-client-1.0.0.jar`
* `target/lib/*.jar`

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation](#installation) instruction and execute the following Java code:

```java

import io.swagger.client.model.*;
import io.swagger.client.api.DetectionVApi;

import java.util.*;

public class DetectionVApiExample {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        
        DetectionVApi apiInstance = new DetectionVApi();

        String version = "version_example"; // String |

            System.out.println(result);
        } catch (ApiException e) {
            System.err.println("Exception when calling DetectionVApi#detectionVPost");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}
```

## Documentation for API Endpoints

All URIs are relative to *https://apigateway.frisscloud.com*

Class | Method | HTTP request | Description
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/base | Send a claim request to detection.
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost2**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost2) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/auto | Send auto claim request to detection.
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost3**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost3) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/home | Send home claim request to detection.
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost4**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost4) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/health | Send health claim request to detection.
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost5**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost5) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/gl/commercial | Send general liability commercial claim request to detection.
*DetectionVApi* | [**detectionVPost6**](docs/DetectionVApi.md#detectionVPost6) | **POST** /api/v{version}/detection/gl/private | Send general liability private claim request to detection.

## Recommendation

It's recommended to create an instance of `ApiClient` per thread in a multithreaded environment to avoid any potential issues.
